dependencies.description: Core functionality to enable azureml-pipeline feature.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-pipeline-core

dependencies.description:
The azureml-train-automl-client package contains functionality for
automatically finding the best machine learning model and its
parameters, given training and test data.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-train-automl-client

dependencies.description:
The azureml-train-core contains functionality used by azureml-train
metapackage.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-train-core

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Azure Machine Learning SDK for Python can be used to create ML
pipelines as well as to submit and track individual pipeline runs.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline

description: Represents a unit of computation in azureml-pipeline.
name: py-azureml-pipeline-steps

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
